law.catch_line: Notice To Department Of Transitional Assistance And Iv D Agency Of All Persons Awarded Cash Winnings Or Prize In Excess Of $600
law.text: [ Text of section added by 2011, 194, Sec. 16 effective November 22, 2011.] Gaming licensees shall, on a monthly basis, transmit to the department of transitional assistance and to the IV-D agency, as set forth in chapter 119A, a list of all persons who were awarded cash winnings or a prize in excess of $600 in the prior month. The information shall be provided in a format which is compatible with the automated data processing systems of the department and the IV-D agency to ensure the immediate identification of persons who may be receiving public assistance benefits. The information provided shall include the name, address and social security number of the person who was awarded the cash or prize valued in excess of $600.
